channel.title: Inwood Park – Steven Chu – Photographer & Visual Experience Designer New York
channel.description: The culture of New York, shaped through photography, iconic brand development, and community building in nightlife.

item.title: Nowhere Boys
item.dc:creator: Steven Chu
item.description: photographed for: East Village Boys + Opening Ceremony In his dreams they played as three. They were […]
item.content:encoded:
photographed for: East Village Boys + Opening Ceremony

In his dreams they played as three.
They were the Lucifer twins. Morgan..
Alfred..
and Daniel.
Daniel was blind,
which worked well for playing hide…
and seek.
Morgan never played, so to one rock he stayed.
However, poor Alfred would not go without his day.
So with blind Daniel he played.
And to one rock they stayed..
In this dream he made.
